import React from "react" import { useState } from "react"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const BasicTable = () =>{ const [getUsers, setUsers] = useState([]); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { const Getusers = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:4000/users/getUsers"); console.log(response); setIsLoading(false) if (response.data) { setUsers(response.data.users); } else { console.error('API response is empty or falsy.'); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching user data:', error.message); } } Getusers(); }, [isLoading]) return (
